AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: Now you can install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

RegionPush.Title: Update: Important announcement regarding to Hi3Mirror issues
RegionPush.Message: Hi3Mirror is now back online. Update Caches, Game Repair and Version Conversion features are now accessible. Thank you for all you patience and once again, apologize for all
